defaultQuotaLimitGiB.description: Default quota limit in Gibs (Quota applies to all users of the share)

defaultShareAccessType.description: Type of Default Share Access. (Read-write, Read-only, No-Access)

fileBlockingExtensions.description: Comma-separated list of file blocking patterns.

shareType.description: Type of Share. Distributed or Standard (General Purpose)

role.description: Role of the given user or group (one of AdMIN or BACKUP_OPERATOR).

user.description: AD user or group name as 'name' or 'NETBIOS\name' format.

addUserAsFsAdmin.description: AD user or group name as 'name' or 'NETBIOS\name' format.

forceLeaveDomain.description: If the joined Active Directory is down or not reachable, then use this option to leave the domain by bypassing all AD interaction. Please ensure to remove the fileserver machine account manually afterwards.

organizationalUnit.description: An Organizational unit container is where the AFS machine account will be created as part of domain join operation. Use a / to specify hierarchical Organization Units. Default container OU is "Computers".  Examples: Engineering, Department/Engineering.

overwriteUserAccount.description: If a machine account with the same name as file-server name is present on the AD, then overwrite it during join-domain operation.

preferredDomainController.description: Use a specific domain controller for join-domain operation in a multi DC Active Directory setups. By default, AFS discovers a site local domain controller for join-domain operation.

useSameCredentialsForDns.description: Use the same AD credential for dns

windowsAdDomainName.description: The windows AD domain the file server is associated with.

windowsAdPassword.description: The password for the above Windows AD account

windowsAdUsername.description: The name of a user account with administrative privileges in the AD domain the file server is associated with.

dnsOpType.description: DNS Nameserver operation type: AFS specific DNS entries are needed on the nameservers so that clients  can connect to the fileserver using its FQDN (fileserver_name.domain_name).  AFS can add these entries automatically for MS-DNS servers or they can be  added manually. Select one of "MS_DNS" or "MANUAL".

dnsPassword.description: Password to use for adding fileserver DNS entries on the nameservers.

dnsServer.description: Preferred Nameserver FQDN (if not given, AFS finds one using an NS query)

dnsUserName.description: Username to use for adding fileserver DNS entries on the nameservers.

addUserAsFsAdmin.description: AD user or group name as 'name' or 'NETBIOS\name' format.

dnsDomainName.description: Fully qualified domain name (fileserver namespace). This, along with the fileserver name, constitutes the namespace of the fileserver. Example:  fileserver_name.corp.companyname.com. This is also used to create  fileserver DNS entries on the nameservers so that clients can access  the fileserver using its name.

dnsServerIpAddresses.description: List of comma-separated dns server ip addresses for file server configuration.

externalNetworks.description: External networks used by file server VMs.

externalVirtualNetworkUuids.description: The identifier of the external virtual network. Please use network UUID on AHV and ESX.

internalNetwork.description: Internal network used by file server VMs.

internalVirtualNetworkUuid.description: The identifier of the internal virtual network. Please use network UUID on AHV and ESX.

memoryGiB.description: Memory associated with each file server VM.

ntpServers.description: List of comma-separated ntp servers for file server configuration.

numCalculatedNvms.description: Total number of file server VMs associated with the file server.

numVcpus.description: Number of vCPUs per file server VM.

organizationalUnit.description: An Organizational unit container is where the AFS machine account will be created as part of domain join operation. Use a / to specify hierarchical Organization Units. Default container OU is "Computers".  Examples: Engineering, Department/Engineering.

pdName.description: Name of the pd going to be associated with the file  server.

preferredDomainController.description: Use a specific domain controller for join-domain operation in a multi DC Active Directory setups. By default, AFS discovers a site local domain controller for join-domain operation.

windowsAdDomainName.description: The windows AD domain the file server is associated with.

windowsAdPassword.description: The password for the above Windows AD account

windowsAdUsername.description: The name of a user account with administrative privileges in the AD domain the file server is associated with.

password.description: The password for the above file server user.

principalName.description: Quota policy principal value (user or group name)

infectedFileUuids.description: Comma-separated list of infected file uuids

principalValue.description: Quota policy principal value (user or group name)

mappingType.description: Mapping type of the search user ie. user or group.

nameOrIds.description: Search identity mapping name or ids

daysOfMonth.description: Comma-separated day of month values for the schedule: 1-31

daysOfWeek.description: Comma-separated day of week values for the schedule: 1-7 (starts with Sunday(1))

localMaxSnapshots.description: Maximum number of snapshots to retain locally

snapshotPolicyFrequency.description: Snapshot policy frequency. Repeat snapshot every nth hour/day. For weekly and monthly, frequency is 1.

snapshotPolicyType.description: Snapshot policy type - hourly, daily, weekly, monthly

windowsAdPassword.description: The password for the above Windows AD account

windowsAdUsername.description: The name of a user account with administrative privileges in the AD domain the file server is associated with.

appConsistentSnapshots.description: Whether consistency group performs app consistent snapshots

relatedEntityUuids.description: List of UUIDs of entities related to this VM e.g. the attached volume groups

vmHandle.description: Internal data-structure used by Cerebro to uniquely identify a vm Should it be displayed to user?

vmId.description: Unique identifier of a virtual machine within a Hypervisor.

vmName.description: Display name of a virtual machine

vmPowerStateOnRecovery.description: Power state after vm recovery. Default power state is POWEREDOFF.
enum: Power state at time of snapshot

cerebroError.description: Cerebro error code for why VM can't be recovered/migrated

reason.description: Human-readable string why VM can't be recovered/migrated

remoteSite.description: Name of the remote site where this VM can't be recovered (Optional)

role.description: Role of the given user or group (one of AdMIN or BACKUP_OPERATOR).

user.description: AD user or group name as 'name' or 'NETBIOS\name' format.

addUserAsFsAdmin.description: AD user or group name as 'name' or 'NETBIOS\name' format.

forceLeaveDomain.description: If the joined Active Directory is down or not reachable, then use this option to leave the domain by bypassing all AD interaction. Please ensure to remove the fileserver machine account manually afterwards.

organizationalUnit.description: An Organizational unit container is where the AFS machine account will be created as part of domain join operation. Use a / to specify hierarchical Organization Units. Default container OU is "Computers".  Examples: Engineering, Department/Engineering.

overwriteUserAccount.description: If a machine account with the same name as file-server name is present on the AD, then overwrite it during join-domain operation.

preferredDomainController.description: Use a specific domain controller for join-domain operation in a multi DC Active Directory setups. By default, AFS discovers a site local domain controller for join-domain operation.

useSameCredentialsForDns.description: Use the same AD credential for dns

windowsAdDomainName.description: The windows AD domain the file server is associated with.

windowsAdPassword.description: The password for the above Windows AD account

windowsAdUsername.description: The name of a user account with administrative privileges in the AD domain the file server is associated with.

password.description: The password for the above file server user.

principalValue.description: Quota policy principal value (user or group name)

shareUuid.description: Uuid of the share that quota policy is associated with

daysOfMonth.description: Comma-separated day of month values for the schedule: 1-31

daysOfWeek.description: Comma-separated day of week values for the schedule: 1-7 (starts with Sunday(1))

fsUuid.description: Uuid of the file server that snapshot policy is associated with

localMaxSnapshots.description: Maximum number of snapshots to retain locally

snapshotPolicyFrequency.description: Snapshot policy frequency. Repeat snapshot every nth hour/day. For weekly and monthly, frequency is 1.

snapshotPolicyType.description: Snapshot policy type - hourly, daily, weekly, monthly

role.description: Role of the given user or group (one of AdMIN or BACKUP_OPERATOR).

user.description: AD user or group name as 'name' or 'NETBIOS\name' format.

password.description: The password for the above file server user.

daysOfMonth.description: Comma-separated day of month values for the schedule: 1-31

daysOfWeek.description: Comma-separated day of week values for the schedule: 1-7 (starts with Sunday(1))

localMaxSnapshots.description: Maximum number of snapshots to retain locally

snapshotPolicyFrequency.description: Snapshot policy frequency. Repeat snapshot every nth hour/day. For weekly and monthly, frequency is 1.

snapshotPolicyType.description: Snapshot policy type - hourly, daily, weekly, monthly

defaultQuotaLimitGiB.description: Default quota limit in Gibs (Quota applies to all users of the share)

defaultShareAccessType.description: Type of Default Share Access. (Read-write, Read-only, No-Access)

fileBlockingExtensions.description: Comma-separated list of file blocking patterns.
